And what's currently trending in the US right now for comparison? I want to show how music tastes vary across borders!

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the weekly Germany Songs chart data, defaulting to the previous week if no specific week is provided, and automatically adjusting dates to the Saturday of the specified week. This endpoint is part of the comprehensive Billboard charts API, which offers access to numerous music rankings including the Hot 100, Billboard 200, Artist 100, Global 200, and specialized charts like Catalog Albums and U.S. Afrobeats Songs, along with year-end rankings across various categories and Greatest of All Time charts.

Provides detailed information about Billboard's Hot 100 chart, displaying the current rankings of the most popular songs in the United States. This endpoint delivers access to Billboard's comprehensive music chart system, which includes not only the Hot 100 but also other major charts like Billboard 200, Billboard Global 200, and Artist 100. Billboard charts are the music industry's standard for measuring the popularity of artists, albums, and songs based on sales, radio airplay, streaming data, and other metrics, offering authoritative insights into current music trends and performance.

tool_list.tool name: Spotify Scraper: List Weekly Top Albums
tool_list.tool description: Lists weekly top albums at any time and in any country, providing a snapshot of popular music across different regions and time periods. This endpoint is part of a comprehensive Spotify scraping solution that extracts various data from the platform, including tracks, lyrics, and episode previews, while also offering high-availability download capabilities for these media types.

Retrieves all songs created by a specific author from a collection of children's song lyrics. This tool searches through a comprehensive database of lyrics specifically designed for children, allowing you to find multiple songs by the same songwriter or composer. Whether you're looking for educational songs, lullabies, or fun sing-alongs for kids, this search function helps you discover a particular author's complete contribution to children's music.

Retrieves current trending music charts and popular tracks. This endpoint taps into TheAudioDB.com's community-driven database of audio metadata, which aims to be the most simple and accurate source of music information from around the world. The service provides access to a comprehensive repository of music data that is continuously updated by the community, offering reliable insights into what's currently popular in the music scene while maintaining the database's commitment to accuracy and global coverage.

Retrieves a comprehensive list of countries that have radio stations available in the system. This endpoint connects you to a vast database of more than 60,000 radio stations spanning across numerous countries worldwide and covering various music genres and broadcast formats. The country list serves as an entry point for exploring the extensive international radio collection, allowing users to subsequently browse stations by their geographic origin.

task_description: This task helps a user find new radio stations to listen to. It involves finding countries that have stations, listing the genres available, and then searching for channels within a specific country and genre.
